definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
to shade one's eyes with one's hand

sentences.english: Covered patio in backyard surrounded by block walls.
sentences.chinese: 在後院蓋頂涼棚四周磚牆。

sentences.english: They sat under the leafy bower at the end of the garden and watched the sun set.
sentences.chinese: 他們坐在花園盡頭由葉子搭成的涼棚下觀看落日。

sentences.english: The aunt of the arbor will get the umbrella out, come in.
sentences.chinese: 涼棚裏的阿姨馬上拿傘出去把姐姐拉了進來。

sentences.english: Nice back yard with side view of hills and patio cover.
sentences.chinese: 良好的後院側觀山，蓋頂涼棚。

sentences.english: The green canopy serves as a cool shelter during the sweltering summer.
sentences.chinese: 在悶熱的夏天，綠色的華蓋就像一個涼棚。

definition: to let air pass through/to ventilate
fire and candles/household things that burn
area above the lintel of a doorway
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
Linqing county level city in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong
altar lamp burning day and night
